game.name: Clash of Armour
game.description:
All adventure lovers now need to come out and should try their hands in this wonderfully-designed free online game – Clash of Armour. We are sure that you will surely be able to cherish this adventurous journey that is full of many thrilling moments. In this one of the best tank battle games, you will be given an opportunity to be a part of the world’s most dangerous battle that you have ever seen. Get yourself participated into the battle and deploy all the tanks of your enemies using your instant response!

It requires to think strategically to include yourself in the list of the last team standing in this cool war game. The player who destroys the other’s turret will win the battle. Check out first that which combination of tanks stands with you, but you are not advised to send out your strongest ones at the same time. Wait until you will see them backing out. Give your best and get ready to wear the crown of the victory in this most awaited cool war game! Now it’s up to you defend your own base in this strategic tank fight game. 

Press the left mouse button of your PC to deploy the tank of your enemies. We know that it’s pretty difficult to level up your stats. However, follow all the instructions, keep your eyes on the screen all the time, and kill as many enemies as you can to be the best tank fighter online. Know the strength and weakness of all the units and send only the right one to fight and help you to win the battle for you in this highly addictive and interest HTML5 online game! Feel free to explore our top war games in full-screen to enjoy a fully immersive experience!

game.mobileControlKeys: TAPC ON THE TANKS IN LOWER ROW(WHEN THEY BECOME GREEN) TO SAVE THE MOTHER TANK
game.webControlKeys: LEFT CLICK OF MOUSE ON THE TANKS IN LOWER ROW(WHEN THEY BECOME GREEN) TO SAVE THE MOTHER TANK
